short_description: This is a remodelled home with beautiful outdoors.
description: Have fun with the family at this stylish fully remodeled cottage. Plenty of outdoor areas to hang out by a fire pit or dine outdoors.

short_description: This is a beach house with soothing waves visible.
description: This 3400 Square foot home delivers a high level of luxury finishes and details. Offers 1 King, 2 Queens with fulls over fulls with trundles.

short_description: This is a stable home with countryside feel and amenities.
description: This place is such a hidden gem. Every single detail in the house has a purpose and was carefully thought out.

short_description: This is our tiny home with lakefront and more.
description: Our tiny home has everything you need for a lakefront family getaway on the Richland Chambers Reservoir.
